# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that the burner entities have a sufficient fuel supply before using them.
- Make sure to replenish the fuel supply when it is depleted.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that the entities have the necessary ingredients before using them.
- Make sure to replenish the ingredients when they are depleted.

### Errors when using entities that are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that the entities are connected to the electric network before using them.
- Make sure to connect the entities to the electric network when they are not connected.

### Errors when using entities with stale data
- Ensure that the entity data is up-to-date before using the entities.
- Make sure to update the entity data when it becomes stale.

# NAMESPACE
### Utility Functions
No utility functions have been defined or invoked.

### Important Variables
No important variables have been assigned.
